children.name: neighborbuildingrendering
children.comment: By default, when placing a schematic near other buildings, the already-placed buildings will show as if they were at level 5 and have a blue outline around them. You can disable that by setting this to false.

children.name: holidayfeatures
children.comment: Should special holiday content be displayed?

children.name: enablecitizenvoices
children.comment: minecolonies.config.enablecitizenvoices.comment

children.name: colonyteamborders
children.comment: When true, the colony borders shown when holding the build tool will be in the colony's team color. When false, the colony you're inside will be white and any other colony will be red.

children.name: neighborbuildingrange
children.comment: How close a building needs to be to another to be considered a neighbor, in blocks. -1 = intersecting, 0 = touching

children.name: buildgogglerange
children.comment: How close (in blocks) you need to be to see work orders while wearing the Build Goggles.

children.name: enabledebuglogging
children.comment: Should the request system show debug information in the debug.log? Useful if malfunctioning.

children.name: generatesupplyloot
children.comment: Whether to generate supply ships and camps in loot chests.

children.name: diseasemodifier
children.comment: How common diseases are. 1 = Very common, 100 = extremely rare.

children.name: maxcitizenpercolony
children.comment: Max citizens in one colony.

children.name: workersalwaysworkinrain
children.comment: Should workers work during the rain?

children.name: alwaysrendernametag
children.comment: Should citizen name tags be rendered?

children.name: skyraiders
children.comment: Raiders will spawn in the sky if this is enabled

children.name: enableindevelopmentfeatures
children.comment: Should development features be enabled (might be buggy)?

children.name: nosupplyplacementrestrictions
children.comment: Disables supply camp placing restrictions, intended for skyworlds and similar

children.name: allowinfinitesupplychests
children.comment: Should players be able to place an infinite amount of supply camps/ships?

children.name: loadtime
children.comment: Set how long chunks stay loaded after player leaves, does not persist through restarts. Default: 10min

children.name: allowotherdimcolonies
children.comment: Should colonies in other dimensions be allowed?

children.name: luckyblockchance
children.comment: Chance for the Miner to get an ore when mining cobblestone or stone (by default, can be expanded with datapacks to other materials). This is a percentage. (To change which ores the Miner can find, see "List of Lucky Ores".)

children.name: initialcitizenamount
children.comment: Amount of initial citizens.

children.name: colonyloadstrictness
children.comment: This controls how many chunks are loaded with the "Chunk Load Colony" option. The higher this value, the fewer chunks will be loaded. (The innermost chunks will be loaded first.) 1 = load all claimed chunks.

children.name: allowinfinitecolonies
children.comment: Should players be allowed to abandon their colony to create a new one easily? Note: This is buggy!

children.name: minthleveltoteleport
children.comment: The minimum level a Town Hall has to be to allow teleportation to allied colonies.

children.name: maxtreesize
children.comment: Max log count in one tree for the Forester to check during their tree search.

children.name: forceloadcolony
children.comment: If part of the colony is loaded by an owner/officer, should the colony be kept loaded? (Set how many chunks are loaded with the "Colony Chunk Loading Strictness" option.)

children.name: foodmodifier
children.comment: Food consumption modifier.

children.name: researchcreativecompletion
children.comment: Allows automatic and (near) instant completion of research for players in creative mode. If false, creative players will still be able to begin researches, but will have normal progress rates.

children.name: researchdebuglog
children.comment: Significantly increases the amount of information related to research datapacks that is logged during the world load.

children.name: researchresetcost
children.comment: A list of items to charge players when undoing an already-completed research.

children.name: initialColonySize
children.comment: minecolonies.config.initialColonySize.comment

children.name: maxdistancefromworldspawn
children.comment: Max distance (in blocks) from world spawn for a colony.

children.name: mindistancefromworldspawn
children.comment: Min distance (in blocks) from world spawn for a colony.

children.name: minColonyDistance
children.comment: minecolonies.config.minColonyDistance.comment

children.name: maxColonySize
children.comment: minecolonies.config.maxColonySize.comment

children.name: dobarbariansspawn
children.comment: minecolonies.config.dobarbariansspawn.comment

children.name: mobattackcitizens
children.comment: Should mobs attack citizens?

children.name: barbarianhordedifficulty
children.comment: minecolonies.config.barbarianhordedifficulty.comment

children.name: dobarbariansbreakthroughwalls
children.comment: minecolonies.config.dobarbariansbreakthroughwalls.comment

children.name: pvp_mode
children.comment: Turn on MineColonies PVP mode (colonies can be destroyed and griefed under certain conditions).

children.name: shouldraiderbreakdoors
children.comment: minecolonies.config.shouldraiderbreakdoors.comment

children.name: guardhealthmult
children.comment: Health multiplier for all Guards.

children.name: guardDamageMultiplier
children.comment: Attack damage multiplier for Guards.

children.name: minimumnumberofnightsbetweenraids
children.comment: The minimum number of nights between raids.

children.name: maxBarbarianSize
children.comment: minecolonies.config.maxBarbarianSize.comment

children.name: averagenumberofnightsbetweenraids
children.comment: The average number of nights between raids.

children.name: permissioneventbypassminpermlevel
children.comment: Disables colony permissions if player has a given permission level.

children.name: enablecolonyprotection
children.comment: Should colony protection be enabled?

children.name: turnoffexplosionsincolonies
children.comment: Independent from the colony protection, should explosions be turned off inside colonies? DAMAGE_NOTHING prevents explosions completely. DAMAGE_PLAYERS, allows explosions to damage players and hostile mobs, but not blocks or neutral or friendly mobs. DAMAGE_ENTITIES allows damage to all entities. DAMAGE_EVERYTHING allows explosions to damage entities and blocks.

children.name: canplayerusekillcitizenscommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc citizens kill command?

children.name: canplayerusemodifycitizenscommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc citizens modify command?

children.name: canplayeruseshowcolonyinfocommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc colony info command?

children.name: canplayeruseaddofficercommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc colony addOfficer command?

children.name: canplayerusecolonytpcommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc colony teleport command?

children.name: canplayeruseallytownhallteleport
children.comment: Can players teleport to allied colonies?

children.name: canplayerusehometpcommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc home command? Note: Only owners of the colony can use this command.

children.name: canplayeruseresetcommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc colony requestsystem-reset command?

children.name: canplayerusertpcommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc rtp command?

children.name: canplayerusedeletecolonycommand
children.comment: Should players be allowed to use the /mc colony delete command?

children.name: auditcraftingtags
children.comment: When loading recipes, generate audit CSV files to help debug datapacks or extra mods.

children.name: debuginventories
children.comment: Enable inventory debugging.

children.name: blueprintbuildmode
children.comment: Turn this on if you're using this world for blueprint building and scanning.

children.name: creativeresolve
children.comment: Should the request system creatively resolve (if possible) when the player is required to resolve a request? This is a debugging tool and can take a very long time to resolve a request.

children.name: netherworkertakesdamage
children.comment: minecolonies.config.netherworkertakesdamage.comment

children.name: pathfindingdebugverbosity
children.comment: Verbosity of pathfinding debug messages.

children.name: minimumrailstopath
children.comment: Minimum number of consecutive rails for citizens to use them.

children.name: pathfindingmaxthreadcount
children.comment: Amount of additional threads to be used for pathfinding.
